attributes.action: Stop Prescription Charges for Methotrexate Users
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a rheumatoid arthritis sufferer aged 40 it is imperative that I take Methotrexate. My recommended dose is weekly for the rest of my life as like many other sufferers, this becomes a costly process, Our situation should be considered the same as other life long users of presrcibed drugs eg Thyroxine.
